CPC delegation arrives 
    Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Communist Party of China led by Zeng Qinghong, alternate member of the political bureau and member of the secretariat of the CPC Central Committee, arrived here today.
 The delegation was met at the airport by choe thae bok, alternate member of the political bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK Wang Guozhang and officials of the embassy.
